title: Fix build fail in ntlify
description:
Build is failing in netlify here is what netlify is telling me
npm run build
4:48:48 PM: > copilot_ralph_webpage@0.0.0 build
4:48:48 PM: > vite build
4:48:48 PM: /opt/build/repo/node_modules/rollup/dist/native.js:115
4:48:48 PM: 		throw new Error(
4:48:48 PM: 		      ^
4:48:48 PM: Error: Cannot find module @rollup/rollup-linux-x64-gnu. npm has a bug related to optional dependencies (https://github.com/npm/cli/issues/4828). Please try `npm i` again after removing both package-lock.json and node_modules directory.
4:48:48 PM:     at requireWithFriendlyError (/opt/build/repo/node_modules/rollup/dist/native.js:115:9)
4:48:48 PM:     at Object.<anonymous> (/opt/build/repo/node_modules/rollup/dist/native.js:124:76)

I think its something related with @netlify.toml config or npm not installling , not sure, olease fix this
